title: USF completes 130 projects
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 25 (APP): Since its inception in 2006, the Universal Service Fund (USF) has completed 130 projects, while 31 projects are currently in progress and are expected to be completed within one and a half years.
An official of the Ministry of IT and Telecom said that 1.5% of the revenue from all service providers goes into the USF, which uses these funds to provide services in underserved and unserved areas, ensuring the availability of data and voice services.
The primary objective of the USF is to connect all citizens of the country, as digitalization has become a crucial priority for both businesses and communities.
